subsection.name: Description
subsection.p: The logger tag declares the name of a logging channel that is consumed by a component type. The logging tag provides management information that may be used by a container during the establishment of logging categories and targets.

tr.td: The name of a subsidiary logging channel relative to the logging channel that is supplied to the component by the container.
